title: 02/01/22 DPS Hour 2 Tom Pelissero and Nick Wright
itunes:title: 02/01/22 DPS Hour 2 Tom Pelissero and Nick Wright
description:
Tom Pelissero talks to Dan about Tom Brady's retirement from the NFL. Tom says he thinks that Brady will remain retired and not come back. Nick Wright tells Dan that Tom Brady should continue to play if that's what he wants to do.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
